answers.author: Sara Imhulse
answers.text:
Check with Seattle.  They have a sculpture of a troll under a bridge.


Check with Seattle.  They have a sculpture of a troll under a bridge.

answers.author: Richard Hoon
answers.text:
The City of Eustis has one of the largest scupture exhibits in Florida - currently 9 permanent and 9 as part of an annual program.  I have contracts (agreements) that you can have and modify.  Send me an email and I'll send them to you!

answers.author: Toni Shrewsbury
answers.text:
Going a step further. Does anyone have a sample agreement for accepting a piece of permanent public art as a donation from a citizen (ie Memorial)?


Going a step further. Does anyone have a sample agreement for accepting a piece of permanent public art as a donation from a citizen (ie Memorial)?

author: Katherine Woerner Caffrey
text: We are contracting with an artist for a piece of sculpture to be placed in a community park. Does anyone have example contracts between the City and artist? Thanks.
title: Example Contracts between City and Artist for Public Art
